title: Eco-Sabotage (S-67789) 2
content:
[[table style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%; font-family:Monospace;font-size:  10pt;"]]
[[row]]
[[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%; background-color: silver;" rowspan="75"]]

[[/hcell]]
[[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: silver;"]]
EVENT NAME:
[[/hcell]]

[[cell style="border: 1px solid black;" rowspan="10"]]
[[=]]
[[size xx-large]]{{FACTORY}}[[/size]]
{{(EST. 1835)}}
[[/=]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]
Negotiation In Response To Sabotage
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: silver;"]]
EVENT ID:
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]
N-58711
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: silver;"]]
IMPORTANCE:
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%" ]]
High
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: silver;"]]
LOCATION:
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]
Fort Cass, Eastern Tennessee Manufacturing Center[[footnote]]Location ID: MC-1533609-ET[[/footnote]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: silver;"]]
DATE:
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black;  padding: 0 1%" ]]
January 6, 2002
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: silver;"colspan="2"]]
PRIMARY ACTOR(S):
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black;  padding: 0 1%" colspan="2"]]
* Unknown Organization Negotiator The Questioner
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: silver;" colspan="2"]]
PRIMARY FACTORY ACTOR:
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black;  padding: 0 1%" colspan="2"]]
* The Investor[[footnote]] Foreman ID: INV00000001 [[/footnote]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]

[[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: silver;"colspan="2"]]
OTHER PARTICIPATING FACTORY ACTORS:
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black;  padding: 0 1%" colspan="2"]]
* Elder Foreman Robert Henegar[[footnote]] Foreman ID: ELD00000007 [[/footnote]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: silver;"colspan="2"]]
OTHER AFFECTED STAKEHOLDERS:
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black;  padding: 0 1%" colspan="2"]]
* Factory Customers In The Eastern Tennessee Region And Sub-Regions
* Factory Stock Holders
* All Personnel Assets At The Fort Cass Location
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: silver;"colspan="2"]]
RELEVANT PRIOR INFORMATION:
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black;  padding: 0 1%" colspan="2"]]
The as yet unidentified group represented by The Questioner has a history of sabotage and attempted hostile takeover with The Factory. This stems from what appears to be a difference of opinion on resource management. On November 13, 2001 this unidentified group began a series of sabotages against Factory assets at the Fort Cass location.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: silver;"colspan="2"]]
DESCRIPTION:
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black;  padding: 0 1%" colspan="2"]]
Evidence of sabotage was detected within the Factory location. After a period of escalated conflict, The Questioner appeared within the Factory. After a series of negotiations, it was determined that the potential cost of retaining the Fort Cass location was higher than the profits to be made.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: silver;"colspan="2"]]
TRIGGER:
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black;  padding: 0 1%" colspan="2"]]
Upon the appearance of The Questioner, The Board of Directors dispatched The Investor to conduct emergency negotiations.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: silver;" colspan="2"]]
ORDER OF EVENTS
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]
**Actor Action**
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]
**Factory Response**
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]
The Questioner was last observed near the base of the //Nyssa sylvatica// instance at the center of The Factory. 
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]
The Investor enters the Factory alone as any misstep or misspoken word could result in a breakdown of negotiation. 
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]
The Questioner does not leave their position at the base of the //Nyssa sylvatica// as basic etiquette would generally dictate. In fact, The Questioner does not acknowledge the presence of The Investor.
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]
The Investor had been appropriately briefed before leaving for negotiation and shows no reaction to The Questioner's rude behavior. As well, The Investor restrains himself from conducting any typically suitable greeting.[[footnote]]
Ex Post Facto: 
@@@@
> A shearing, screeching, building to a pitch outside of human hearing.
[[/footnote]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]


[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]

[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]
The Investor carefully travels the structurally unsound floor of Primary Production Level 1. 
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]

[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]
Upon his arrival, The Investor makes great efforts to neither observe nor acknowledge The Questioner. While carefully studying a section of exposed rebar, The Investor speaks.[[footnote]]
@@@@
> Squeaking and grinding, like that of a hinge on a seldom used door.
[[/footnote]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]
The Questioner moves closer to The Investor, washing the area in the scent of moss and damp earth.[[footnote]]
@@@@
> The silence of a glade in springtime.
[[/footnote]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]
The Investor tenses, but does not move away. He bends to examine a fleck of fallen rust upon the root of the //Nyssa sylvatica//.[[footnote]]
@@@@
> Clicking, then whirring, followed by the sound of a far off pneumatic press.
[[/footnote]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]
The Questioner turns and descends through a gap in the broken floor.[[footnote]]
@@@@
> The silence after a hammer strikes, after machinery powers off, and of the absence of industry.
[[/footnote]] The broken floor had formed a basin that was filled with clean, pure water.
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]
The Investor produces a copy of a contract establishing terms of a cease of hostility between all present parties.[[footnote]]
@@@@
> Gurgling as oil and blood are forced through a piston.
[[/footnote]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]
The Questioner takes the contract and carelessly drops it into the basin of water.[[footnote]]
@@@@
> The silence of a predator stalking its prey.
[[/footnote]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]
The Investor moves suddenly to seize The Questioner before finding his movement impaired.[[footnote]]
@@@@
> The grinding and tearing of limbs caught between gears.
[[/footnote]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]


[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]

[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]
The Investor is compelled to descend into the basin of water.[[footnote]]
@@@@
> The crash of mechanical failure.
[[/footnote]] As his feet enter the water, he makes eye contact with his reflection and sinks slowly into the water.[[footnote]]
@@@@
> A hiss, steam escaping a sealed gasket.
[[/footnote]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]
The Questioner turns away and disappears from the Factory.[[footnote]]
@@@@
> The silence of acquiescence and sacrifice.
[[/footnote]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0 1%"]]

[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: silver;"colspan="2"]]
RESULTS/FOLLOW UP
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black;  padding: 0 1%" colspan="2"]]
A retrieval team was sent into The Factory after a period of 24 hours, 47 minutes, 12 second with no contact from The Investor. The Investor was found seated upon a slab of fallen concrete and was escorted away from The Factory.[[footnote]]
@@@@
> The gurgling of an empty fuel reservoir. The echo of hammer strikes in an infinitely long tunnel.
[[/footnote]]
For further context to this event, reference [[[http://www.scp-wiki.net/eco-sabotage-s-67789/offset/0|Document S-67789]]].
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[/table]]
author: torcsandantlers
